about_the_game:
Support the developer & the musicians, by buying the Gold Edition!

- 3 Bonus levels
- A new ability (The Sky Dagger!)
- A new Boss fight (Derpy Dragon)
- New in-game music tracks!
- Includes full game soundtrack of 43 tracks (OST)
- Bonus EnV Jazz track
- HD digital posters (3 of them!)
- In-development GIFs, screenshots
- Behind the scenes developer sketches
- 500mb of behind the scenes developer sketches, in-development GIFs, screenshot & gifs of the development dog, Max!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel Processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound

name: Electronic Super Joy 2 - Gold Edition

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Electronic Super Joy 2 - Gold Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or equivalent
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or equivalent
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound

short_description: Do you want the Gold Edition Experience? Do you want to support the developers & musicians of this game? Then buy the GOLD EDITION! 3 new levels, Boss Fight, New Ability, Bonus Music, full game soundtrack of 43 songs, 3 Full-sized HD Digital Posters, and Behind The Scenes developer sketches + in-progress screenshots & GIFs.
